xmlText.p: First Period_1, Buffalo, Pouliot 12 (Baptiste, Antipin), 14:26. 2, Buffalo, Okposo 11 (Rodrigues, O'Reilly), 16:31 (pp). Penalties_Baptiste, BUF, (high sticking), 7:04; Marchand, BOS, (slashing), 12:15; Chara, BOS, (hooking), 16:16; Boston bench, served by DeBrusk (too many men on the ice), 19:21; Reinhart, BUF, (tripping), 19:25.
Second Period_3, Boston, McAvoy 6 (Pastrnak, Marchand), 3:35. 4, Buffalo, Rodrigues 5 (Ristolainen, Reinhart), 7:50. Penalties_Pouliot, BUF, (holding), 10:16.
Third Period_5, Buffalo, Scandella 4 (Antipin, Pominville), 3:22. Penalties_Miller, BOS, (tripping), 1:16; Krug, BOS, (slashing), 9:04; Larsson, BUF, (slashing), 14:47.
Goalies_Boston, Khudobin 13-4-4 (24 shots-20 saves). Buffalo, Johnson 5-10-3 (35-34).
Referees_Francis Charron, Dave Jackson. Linesmen_Kory Nagy, Tony Sericolo.
